title: Apple drops trade-in value for Mac, iPad, and Apple Watch models, but iPhone unaffected
content:
If you’re waiting to trade in your old Mac, iPad, or Apple Watch for a new model, bad news. Apple has lowered the estimated prices for all of these products, which means you’ll get less when trading in them for a new product by the company. The good news is that the iPhone value remains unchanged.

more…

The post Apple drops trade-in value for Mac, iPad, and Apple Watch models, but iPhone unaffected appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has lowered the estimated prices for all Mac, iPad, and Apple Watch models for trade-in, but iPhone prices remains unchanged.
